en: O God, thou art my God; earnestly will I seek thee: My soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee, In a dry and weary land, where no water is.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chu ka Pathien i na, zîngkâr zawng ka ti che; Ram ṭâwl chautak, tui um nawna hmuna hin, Ka hringna hi nangma ngaiin a dangchâr a, ka tisa hin a ngai che a nih.

en: So have I looked upon thee in the sanctuary, To see thy power and thy glory.
hmr: Chuong ang bawkin hmun inthienga chun ka en zing che kha, I thilthawtheina le i ropuina hmu dingin.

en: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, My lips shall praise thee.
hmr: I zainêmna hi hringna nêka a ṭhatlem leiin, Ka hmûr hin inpâk a ti che.

en: So will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
hmr: Chuong ang chun ka dam sûng po po chun inpâk ka ti cheh a, I hmingin ka kuthai phar ka tih.

en: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; And my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips;
hmr: Ka hringna hi thlin le thâua khawp angin khawp a ta, Ka bau hin hlim hmûr putin inpâk bawk a ti che.

en: When I remember thee upon my bed, And meditate on thee in the night-watches.
hmr: Ka khumlaizâwlah ka hriet zing cheh a, Zâna i chungchâng thu ka suongtuo lai chun.

en: For thou hast been my help, And in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
hmr: Nang chu a mi ṭhangpuitu i ni sih a, I thla hnuoia chun hlimin hla ka sak ding a nih.

en: My soul followeth hard after thee: Thy right hand upholdeth me.
hmr: Ka hringna hin a zui tlat cheh a, I kut changtiengin i mi kei hlak.

en: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, Shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
hmr: Ka hringna sukbo tuma zawngtuhai ruok chu, Hnuoi hmun hnuoi hnungahai chun lût an tih.

en: They shall be given over to the power of the sword: They shall be a portion for foxes.
hmr: Kâwlhnâm thilthawtheina kuoma pêk nîng an ta, Sihalhai chan ni tâng an tih.

en: But the king shall rejoice in God: Every one that sweareth by him shall glory; For the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
hmr: Lal ruok chu Pathienah hlim a ta, Ama sâla inkhâm taphawt chun ama chu sawng an tih; Khêl hril hmanghai bau chu hipin a um ding a ni sih a.
